claim: Jay Sekulow is the Chief Counsel for the American Center for Law & Justice.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The American Center for Law & Justice  (  ACLJ  )  is a politically conservative , Christian-based social activism organization in the United States .

claim: Jay Sekulow is the Chief Counsel for the American Center for Law & Justice.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Jay Alan Sekulow  (  born June 10 , 1956  )  is an American attorney and Chief Counsel for the American Center for Law & Justice  (  ACLJ  )  .

claim: Jay Sekulow is the Chief Counsel for the American Center for Law & Justice.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In addition , he is the Executive Director at the American Center for Law & Justice  (  ACLJ  )  , an international public interest law firm and educational organization founded by his father , Jay Sekulow , Chief Counsel for the ACLJ .
